content: I was wondering why the i686 test failure from https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/issues/10004 went unnoticed and looked at the CI workflow. AFAICS we don't run the testsuite on i686 at all. Shouldn't we try to run it for all tier 1 platforms or at least for those where it is possible with runners hosted on GH actions?

Not the cargo unittests AFAICS, e.g. https://github.com/rust-lang-ci/rust/runs/3994427968?check_suite_focus=true
(searching for "Running[0m unittests"). Actually x86_64-gnu and x86_64-gnu-tools don't seem to run them either.
